Shell trousers in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams at critical points and a zip fly with a press-stud. Side pockets with hook and loop fastenings, seams at the knees and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the waist and hems. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
